meta.title: About SwipeScout | Our Mission and Team
meta.description: Learn about SwipeScout's mission to revolutionize recruitment with video resumes and our dedicated team of professionals.
meta.keywords: about SwipeScout, company mission, recruitment technology, hiring platform team
meta.ogDescription: Discover how SwipeScout is changing the way people find jobs and companies find talent through innovative technology.

hero.title: About SwipeScout
hero.subtitle: Revolutionizing the way people find jobs and companies find talent
hero.description: Founded in 2025, SwipeScout combines the efficiency of modern technology with the human touch needed in recruitment. Our platform bridges the gap between talented professionals and innovative companies through intuitive video profiles and smart matching algorithms.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: To make job searching as engaging and effective as social networking, while giving employers better tools to discover authentic talent.
mission.description2: We believe the traditional resume is outdated. Video profiles allow candidates to showcase their personality, communication skills, and passion in ways paper never could.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Passionate professionals dedicated to transforming the recruitment experience

whatIsSwipeScout.question: What is SwipeScout?
whatIsSwipeScout.answer: SwipeScout is a modern recruitment platform that connects job seekers with employers through video profiles and AI-powered matching. We make hiring more personal and efficient.

createVideoResume.question: How do I create a video resume?
createVideoResume.answer: Navigate to your profile and click "Create Video Resume". You can record directly or upload a 45-second video showcasing your skills and personality.

videoVisibility.question: Is my video resume publicly visible?
videoVisibility.answer: You control visibility in Settings. Choose between public, only to employers you apply to, or private until you activate it.

jobPostingCost.question: How much does it cost to post jobs?
jobPostingCost.answer: We offer free basic listings. Premium plans with advanced features start at $99/month. Volume discounts available for enterprise clients.

videoFormats.question: What video formats are supported?
videoFormats.answer: We support MP4, MOV, and WebM formats up to 100MB. Recommended resolution is 1080p (1920x1080) for optimal quality.

uploadFailing.question: Why is my video upload failing?
uploadFailing.answer: Check file size (<100MB), format, and internet connection. If issues persist, try compressing your video or contact support.

howMatching.question: How does matching work?
howMatching.answer: Our AI analyzes job requirements and candidate profiles to suggest the best matches. Employers and candidates can then connect directly.

searchCandidates.question: Can I search candidates by skills?
searchCandidates.answer: Yes! Use our advanced search filters to find candidates by skills, experience level, location, and more.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We would love to hear from you. You can reach out to us using the options below.

email.title: Email Us Directly
email.description: For general questions or inquiries, please send us an email.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SwipeScout ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our video recruitment platform and related services.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.accountInfo: Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, profile picture

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to SwipeScout! These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: As a user, you agree to provide accurate information, maintain the security of your account, and use the service in compliance with applicable laws.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content and materials on the SwipeScout platform are owned by SwipeScout or our licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SwipeScout uses cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and your choices regarding cookies.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are used to store small pieces of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded on your browser.

howSwipeScoutUsesCookies.title: How SwipeScout Uses Cookies
howSwipeScoutUsesCookies.content: When you use and access the Service, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes: Authentication, Security, Performance, and Analytics.

yourChoices.title: Your Choices Regarding Cookies
yourChoices.content: If you prefer to avoid the use of cookies on the Service, you must first disable the use of cookies in your browser and then delete the cookies saved in your browser associated with this service.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At SwipeScout, we are committed to maintaining a respectful and inclusive community. These Community Guidelines outline the standards of behavior expected from all users.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree to use the Service only for purposes that are legal and in accordance with these Community Guidelines. You must not use the Service in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair the Service.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.content: You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of the Service. We reserve the right to monitor disputes between you and other users and to terminate your account if you violate these guidelines.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: SwipeScout respects intellectual property rights and expects users to do the same. This section outlines our policies regarding copyright and intellectual property.

userGeneratedContent.title: User-Generated Content
userGeneratedContent.content: You retain ownership of the content you create and share on SwipeScout. However, by using our service, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and display such content.

reportingInfringements.title: Reporting Infringements
reportingInfringements.content: If you believe that your copyright or intellectual property rights have been violated, please contact us immediately with the relevant details.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This End User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you and SwipeScout regarding your use of our software and services.

licenseGrant.title: License Grant
licenseGrant.content: Subject to your compliance with this EULA, SwipeScout grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the software and services for your personal or internal business purposes.

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.content: You may not: (a) modify, adapt, or create derivative works based on the software; (b) reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the software; (c) distribute, sell, or lease the software to any third party.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: This EULA is effective until terminated by either party. You may terminate it at any time by discontinuing use of the software and services and deleting all copies in your possession. SwipeScout may terminate it if you breach any terms of this EULA.
